extendedInfo.description: With over 1400 previously owned cars bought and sold every week, and 100s for under Â£3000, you can't beat Central Car Auctions for range or choice of vehicles from main dealers, companies, trade and private sellers. From prestige vehicles to pick-ups, small family hatchbacks to estates, we've something for everyone and much more besides.

reviews.title: Mobile car auction
reviews.comment: This app is great. I\'ve been to CCA a few times but this is such a convenient and simply app to use on the go! I also got an instant valuation for my car, all straight from the app!   It takes seconds to check if there\'s any cars of interest to me!  Would recommend it for private and trade buyers! A++
reviews.author: simon mclaughlin
